name: Inner Docklands
role_in_state: Primary maritime hub and reagent/augury exchange
culture_adjustments: Guild-run civic identity supersedes neighborhood kinship
Pragmatic syncretism: mixed rites for quick loading/unloading
Creole coastal speech more common than formal Coastal Tongues
Higher tolerance for foreign crews and hybrid customs
Workday rhythms dictated by tide-calendar and cargo schedules
constraints: Limited quay space; vertical storage pressure
Ritual magic depends on scarce imported reagents
Combustion/steam industry limited by state constraints
notes: Primary entry point for state reagent imports and duties
Guild tribunals handle most commercial disputes
Navigational auguries offered but cannot replace charts/seamanship
